fxInfo_clarification: Absolute immunity means immunity from all types of legal process. Limited immunity means immunity only for certain types of actions. Please note in the comments section if there are any time restrictions for immunity or if immunity can be waived.
fxInfo_question: Does the constitution provide for immunity for the members of the legislature under some conditions?

fxInfo_responses.value: Other, please specify in the comments section

name: e_ccp_immunity
